title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1272.10 - Use of fire extinguishing equipment restricted
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1272.10 - Use of fire extinguishing equipment restricted

State Regulations

Fire extinguisher equipment at the air terminal shall not
be tampered with at any time or used for any purpose other than fire fighting
or fire prevention. All such equipment shall be inspected in conformity with
the National Fire Protection Association's regulations. Tags showing the date
of the last such inspection shall be left attached to each
unit. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1272.10

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
